title: Baker Mayfield, Cam Newton, Patriots-Chiefs, & the Herd Hierarchy
itunes:title: Baker Mayfield, Cam Newton, Patriots-Chiefs, & the Herd Hierarchy
description:
Colin explains some of the obstacles Cleveland Browns QB Baker Mayfield is facing, why the injury of Carolina Panthers QB Cam Newton may help the team, why the New England Patriots most likely went after WR Antonio Brown, and his new Herd Hierarchy. Guests include Mark Schlereth, Peter King, Sam Monson, and Reggie Bush.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
